messages.subject: Re: Hi!  I'm new here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Lanie!  It s completely normal to wrestle with doubts.  This is a great place to discuss them and learn.  I m sure you will find this group a wonderful
messages.messageBody:
Hi, Lanie! It's completely normal to wrestle with doubts. This is a
great place to discuss them and learn. I'm sure you will find this
group a wonderful resource. Welcome!

Tina

messages.subject: Hi!  I'm new here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi!  I m new to the list.  I have been learning about unschooling for the past several months and I love it philosophically.  For the most part I love it for
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I'm new to the list. I have been learning about unschooling for
the past several months and I love it philosophically. For the most
part I love it for homeschooling my eight year old. I still
occassionally wrestle with doubts, but I'm hoping this list will help
with that :)


I look forward to chatting with you all as I explore the unschooling
philosophy.

Lanie
